text: int main ( ) { int t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { int n , i ; int long total = 0 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int long a [ 100001 ] ; int long d [ 100001 ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ i ] ) ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { d [ i ] = 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n - 1 ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i + 1 ] >= a [ i ] ) d [ i + 1 ] = d [ i ] + 1 ; } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { total = total + d [ i ] ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , total ) ; } }
